      • generateMenuScreen

        protected int generateMenuScreen()
        The PromotionItem Management Menu
        Specified by:
        generateMenuScreen in class BaseMenu
        Returns:
        Exit Code. Return 1 to exit the program and -1 to exit to main menu

      • printPromotion

        private void printPromotion()
        Prints the menu of promotions stored in the CSV file. Uses MainApp.promotions and MenuItem.retrieveMenuItem(int).

      • addNewPromotion

        private void addNewPromotion()
        Method to add a new promotion. Uses PromoCSVHelper.writeToCsv(ArrayList) to facilitate I/O operations.

      • editPromotion

        private void editPromotion()
        Method to edit an existing promotion. Uses PromoCSVHelper.writeToCsv(ArrayList) and PromotionItem.retrievePromotion(int) to facilitate I/O operations.

      • deletePromotion

        private void deletePromotion()
        Method to delete an existing promotion. Uses PromoCSVHelper.writeToCsv(ArrayList) to facilitate I/O operations.
